node_info.subtitle: ={{$parameter[
node_info.description: Makes an HTTP request and returns the response data
node_info.name: HTTP Request

properties.name: method
properties.description: The request method to use

properties.name: url
properties.description: The URL to make the request to

properties.name: authentication
properties.description: We've already implemented auth for many services so that you don't have to set it up manually

options.name: Predefined Credential Type
options.description: We've already implemented auth for many services so that you don't have to set it up manually

options.name: Generic Credential Type
options.description: Fully customizable. Choose between basic, header, OAuth2, etc.

properties.displayName: Make sure you have specified the scope(s) for the Service Account in the credential
properties.name: googleApiWarning

properties.displayName: Provide certificates in node's 'Credential for SSL Certificates' parameter
properties.name: provideSslCertificatesNotice
sendQuery
properties.description: Whether the request has query params or not

properties.name: sendHeaders
properties.description: Whether the request has headers or not

properties.name: sendBody
properties.description: Whether the request has a body or not

properties.name: contentType
properties.description: Content-Type to use to send body parameters

properties.name: specifyBody
properties.description: The body can be specified using explicit fields (keypair) or using a JavaScript object (json)

properties.name: bodyParameters
properties.description: ID of the field to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: name
values.description: ID of the field to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: value
values.description: Value of the field to set

properties.name: bodyParameters
properties.description: ID of the field to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: name
values.description: ID of the field to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: value
values.description: Value of the field to set

values.name: inputDataFieldName
values.description: The name of the incoming field containing the binary file data to be processed

properties.name: bodyParameters
properties.description: ID of the field to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: name
values.description: ID of the field to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: value
values.description: Value of the field to set

properties.name: inputDataFieldName
properties.description: The name of the incoming field containing the binary file data to be processed

properties.name: options
properties.description: Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.
properties.hint: Use expression mode and $response to access response data

options.name: batching
options.description: Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.

values.name: batchSize
values.description: Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.

values.name: batchInterval
values.description: Time (in milliseconds) between each batch of requests. 0 for disabled.

options.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
options.description: Whether to download the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible

values.name: followRedirects
values.description: Whether to follow all redirects

values.name: maxRedirects
values.description: Max number of redirects to follow

values.name: followRedirects
values.description: Whether to follow all redirects

values.name: maxRedirects
values.description: Max number of redirects to follow

options.name: response
options.description: Whether to return the full response (headers and response status code) data instead of only the body

values.name: fullResponse
values.description: Whether to return the full response (headers and response status code) data instead of only the body

values.name: neverError
values.description: Whether to succeeds also when status code is not 2xx

values.name: responseFormat
values.description: The format in which the data gets returned from the URL

values.name: outputPropertyName
values.description: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read file

options.name: pagination
options.hint: Use expression mode and $response to access response data

values.name: paginationMode
values.description: If pagination should be used

options.name: Update a Parameter in Each Request
options.displayName: Update A Parameter In Each Request

values.displayName: Use the $response variables to access the data of the previous response. Refer to the docs for more info about pagination/
values.name: webhookNotice
nextURL
values.description: Should evaluate to the URL of the next page. More info.

values.name: parameters
values.description: Where the parameter should be set
values.hint: Use expression mode and $response to access response data

values.name: type
values.description: Where the parameter should be set

values.name: value
values.hint: Use expression mode and $response to access response data

values.name: paginationCompleteWhen
values.description: When should no further requests be made?

values.name: statusCodesWhenComplete
values.description: Accepts comma-separated values

values.name: completeExpression
values.description: Should evaluate to true when pagination is complete. More info.

values.name: limitPagesFetched
values.description: Whether the number of requests should be limited

values.name: maxRequests
values.description: Maximum amount of request to be make

values.name: requestInterval
values.description: Time in milliseconds to wait between requests
values.hint: At 0 no delay will be added

options.name: timeout
options.description: Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request

properties.displayName: You can view the raw requests this node makes in your browser's developer console
properties.name: infoMessage
optimizeResponse
properties.description: Whether the optimize the tool response to reduce amount of data passed to the LLM that could lead to better result and reduce cost

properties.name: dataField
properties.description: Specify the name of the field in the response containing the data
properties.hint: leave blank to use whole response

properties.name: fieldsToInclude
properties.description: What fields response object should include

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Comma-separated list of the field names. Supports dot notation. You can drag the selected fields from the input panel.

properties.name: cssSelector
properties.description: Select specific element(e.g. body) or multiple elements(e.g. div) of chosen type in the response HTML.

properties.name: onlyContent
properties.description: Whether to return only content of html elements, stripping html tags and attributes
properties.hint: Uses less tokens and may be easier for model to understand

properties.name: elementsToOmit
properties.description: Comma-separated list of selectors that would be excluded when extracting content

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
